name: A Castle For Trolls
description:
Watch your village of one-legged trolls thrive!

This is a little city builder where your goal is to build the castle while keeping your workers alive. Cut trees, hunt rabbits, build everything! Optimize your economy and produce as quickly as you can -- just make sure the workers have enough food!

Controlled with just the mouse.

Thanks for checking out my game! I appreciate your time. If you enjoyed it please consider supporting this solo developer by clicking the button above.

Feedback and bug reports are welcome, whether you liked it or not!

  • Music from FreePD.com
  • Sounds from Freesound.org (edited)
  • Title font "Cardinal" from DaFont.com
